definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: However Pinot Blanc balances between softness and freshness to make the lightest wine in Alsace.
sentences.chinese: 白皮諾比其他阿爾薩斯白葡萄酒芳香味淡點。

sentences.english: The stylistic vision of this wine is an "Oregon version" of Alsatian Pinot Gris.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒用俄勒岡產阿爾薩斯白皮諾釀造。

sentences.english: France ceded Alsace-Lorrance to Germany in 1871.
sentences.chinese: 法國於1871年將阿爾薩斯和洛林割讓給德國。

sentences.english: Alsace has a good network of trains and buses.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾薩斯有一個良好的鐵路及公交網絡。

sentences.english: The plague is discovered in Alterac by Jaina and Arthas.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾薩斯與珍娜發現奧特蘭克的瘟疫。

sentences.english: The Poodle, the Pom, the Alsatian.
sentences.chinese: 獅子狗，博美狗，阿爾薩斯。

sentences.english: Uther informs King Terenas of Arthas's actions.
sentences.chinese: 烏瑟爾向國王泰瑞納斯報告了阿爾薩斯的行動。

sentences.english: Ah! it has been the great misfortune of our Alsace always to postpone its lessons until to-morrow.
sentences.chinese: 我們阿爾薩斯人的最大不幸就是把教育拖延到明天。

sentences.english: Uther and the knights of the Silver Hand rescues Arthas at Hearthglen.
sentences.chinese: 烏瑟爾與銀手騎士團趕來，在熔爐谷解救了阿爾薩斯。

sentences.english: Arthas murdered his father and lead the Scourge to laying waste to Lordaeron.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾薩斯殺死了他的父親，把瘟疫帶到了洛丹倫。

sentences.english: Players will be fighting alongside Prince Arthas before he falls to the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 玩家將在阿爾薩斯墮落成巫妖王之前與他並肩作戰。

sentences.english: Peace was signed at Frankfort surrendering the provinces of Alsace and Lorraine to the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 和平協議在法蘭克福簽署，阿爾薩斯和洛林。

definition: Jura mountains of eastern France and extending into Switzerland
Han of the Five dynasties (951-979), one of ten kingdoms during the Five Dynasties, Ten Kingdoms period (907-960)
Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
